title: Should We Kiss First?
overview: A story of the love lives of four middle-aged adults, who have lost their faith in love.Son Moo Han works as a managing director of an advertising company. Meanwhile, Ahn Soon Jin lost her daughter unexpectedly and she works as a flight attendant. Eun Kyung Soo is Ahn Soon Jin's ex-husband and his new wife is Baek Ji Min.
